articles.title: Why gold and silver prices are surging at breakneck speeds - The Washington Post
articles.description: A record-setting rally in precious metals comes as global investors diversify away from the U.S. dollar, a phenomenon known as the “debasement trade.”

articles.title: Dow Jones Futures: AMD, Astera, Oklo, Rocket Lab, Tesla Sell Off; Fed Meeting Next - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Dow Jones Futures: AMD, Astera, Oklo, Rocket Lab and Tesla all sold off sharply Monday. The Fed's two-day meeting kicks off Tuesday.

articles.title: Bank of America resets Meta stock forecast before earnings - thestreet.com
articles.description: Here’s what could happen to Meta shares next.

articles.title: Landmark social media trial to begin over addiction claims - BBC
articles.description: Defendants include Meta, which owns Instagram and Facebook, TikTok's owner ByteDance and YouTube parent Google.

articles.title: What travelers can expect as Southwest Airlines introduces assigned seats - ABC News
articles.description: Southwest Airlines passengers are making their final boarding-time scrambles for seats as the carrier prepares to end its signature open-seating system

articles.title: Meta to test premium subscriptions on Instagram, Facebook, and WhatsApp - TechCrunch
articles.description: In the coming months, Meta is going to explore a premium experience on Instagram, Facebook, and WhatsApp that gives users access to special features and more control over how they share and connect, while keeping the core experiences free.

articles.title: Nike to lay off hundreds in Memphis area: Reports - wreg.com
articles.description: MEMPHIS, Tenn. — Nike will reportedly lay off several hundred workers, primarily at distribution facilities in the Memphis area, several publications reported Monday. The Portland Oregonian reports 775 distribution center employees mainly in Tennessee and Mis…

articles.title: TikTok Data Center Outage Triggers Trust Crisis for New US Owners - WIRED
articles.description: The technical failure coincided with TikTok’s ownership transition, leading users to question whether videos criticizing ICE raids in Minnesota were being intentionally censored.

articles.title: European Union opens investigation into Musk’s AI chatbot Grok over sexual deepfakes - AP News
articles.description: European Union regulators have opened a formal investigation into Elon Musk's social media platform X after its AI chatbot Grok started producing nonconsensual sexualized deepfake images. The scrutiny from Brussels comes after Grok sparked backlash by using A…

articles.title: Former Citigroup executive sues bank over handling of sexual harassment claims - Financial Times
articles.description: Complaint alleges ‘unrelenting and egregious sexual harassment’ by wealth chief Andy Sieg

articles.title: Dollar slides to 4-month low on efforts to boost the yen, which could spell trouble for U.S. equities - MarketWatch
articles.description: A stronger yen would deprive traders of access to a historically cheap currency that has long been used to buy American stocks

articles.title: Trump’s own Big Beautiful Bill could add $5.5 trillion to the deficit and help sabotage his plan to ‘grow out’ of the national debt crisis - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Prior to the passage of the One Big Beautiful Bill, Trump’s “growth” math stood a chance of closing the gap. Now it’s much harder to see it working.

articles.title: Michael Burry, an Early GameStop Buyer, Is Back Hyping the Stock - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Shares of GameStop Corp. rallied on Monday after Michael Burry, the money manager made famous by The Big Short, wrote that he has been buying the stock.

articles.title: Apple Watch user gave ChatGPT Health his data, with troubling results - 9to5Mac
articles.description: ChatGPT Health launched recently with Apple Health integration, but a journalist’s experiment with the new technology didn’t go very well.

articles.title: Social network UpScrolled sees surge in downloads following TikTok’s US takeover - TechCrunch
articles.description: UpScrolled is a social network that pledges to remain impartial to political agendas. It blends familiar features from Instagram and X, letting users share photos, videos, and text posts, discover new content, and send direct messages.

articles.title: Marshall does not plan to offer credit card amendment at crypto markup - Politico
articles.description: The amendment would have pitted the finance industry against major retailers and jeopardized passage of landmark crypto legislation.
